import React from 'react' import {MDBTable,MDBTableHead,MDBTableBody,MDBRow,MDBCol,MDBContainer} from 'mdb-react-ui-kit' const Read = () => { const [data,setdata] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ userData(); },[]) const userData = async()=>{ return await axios.get("http://localhost:4000/users") .then((res)=>setdata(res.data)) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } console.log("data", data) return ( <>

Search,Filter sort ,pagination using json fakr api

Sr.No. Name Email Phone Address Status {data.length === 0 ? ( tr No Data Found ):( data.map((item,index)=>( {index+1} )) )}
) } export default Read
